import "./Explanation.css"; import "./Example.css"; const Explanation = () => { return (

How it works?

Create

Create a fun learning game in minutes – we call these ‘TechLectures’.
The format and number of questions is up to you. Add videos, images and
diagrams to your questions to amplify engagement.

Play

TechLectures are best played in a group setting. To join a game, you need a
unique PIN. If you’re the game host, you need a big screen. Players
answer on their own devices, while questions are displayed on a shared
screen. In addition to live games, you can also send TechLecture challenges
that players complete at their own pace – for example, for homework
or remote training.

Share

After a game, encourage players to create and share their own
TechLectures! With one of our premium plans for schools or business, you
can co-create games with your colleagues and save time on finding
relevant TechLectures for your class or training session.

); }; export default Explanation;
